title: _GET_SCRIPT_GFX_POSITION
content:
0x6DD8F5AA635EB4B2// GetScriptGfxPosition
void _GET_SCRIPT_GFX_POSITION(float x, float y, float* calculatedX, float* calculatedY);Parameters:x: The input X coordinate.y: The input Y coordinate.calculatedX: A pointer to the calculated X value.calculatedY: A pointer to the calculated Y value.Calculates the effective X/Y fractions when applying the values set by SET_SCRIPT_GFX_ALIGN and
SET_SCRIPT_GFX_ALIGN_PARAMS.Examples:Lualocal calcX, calcX = GetScriptGfxPosition(0.2, 0.2)
codeBlocks:
// GetScriptGfxPosition
void _GET_SCRIPT_GFX_POSITION(float x, float y, float* calculatedX, float* calculatedY);
